sentences.en: ‘You don’t need me,’ she said quietly, without reproach.
sentences.cn: “你不需要我。”她语气平静，没有丝毫责备。

sentences.en: Do not reproach yourself, it was not your fault.
sentences.cn: 不要责备你自己, 这不是你的过错.

sentences.en: He argued that the reproaches were unfair.
sentences.cn: 他争辩说这些批评不公正。

sentences.en: He gave Helen a look of bitter reproach.
sentences.cn: 他责怪地冷冷看了海伦一眼.

sentences.en: He looked at her with reproach.
sentences.cn: 他用责备的目光看着她。

sentences.en: His conduct has been beyond reproach.
His voice was full of reproach.
sentences.cn: 他的话完全是一种责备的语气。

sentences.en: It was a jest rather than a reproach.
sentences.cn: 这与其说是责备，还不如说是句玩笑呢。

sentences.en: She got a sharp reproach from her boss.
sentences.cn: 她受到了上司的严厉训斥.

sentences.en: She is quick to reproach anyone who doesn't live up to her own high standards.
sentences.cn: 只要有人不符合她自己的高标准，她马上就会加以指责。

sentences.en: The shootings and bombings were "a scandal and reproach to all of us in Europe".
sentences.cn: 这些枪杀和轰炸事件是“我们所有欧洲人的丑闻和耻辱”。

sentences.en: The slums are a reproach to London.
These derelict houses are a reproach to the city.
sentences.cn: 这些破旧房屋的存在是这个城市的耻辱。

sentences.en: Torn between anger and self - reproach, he could hardly fall asleep.
sentences.cn: 他又是气愤,又埋怨自己, 简直没法睡着.

sentences.en: We begin to reproach ourselves for not having been more careful.
sentences.cn: 我们开始自责起来，怪自己不够小心。

sentences.en: Women in public life must be beyond reproach.
sentences.cn: 女性参与公众生活无可非议。

sentences.en: Your reproach cuts me to the heart.
sentences.cn: 你的责备使我伤透了心.

words.tran_cn: 无可非议的；无可非难的

phrases.tran_cn: 无可指摘：十分完美的以至于排除了任何受批评的可能性

trans.tran_cn: 责备，责骂，耻辱，污辱，谴责，[宗]应答圣歌
trans.tran_en: If you look at or speak to someone with reproach, you show or say that you are disappointed, upset, or angry because they have done something wrong
to blame or criticize someone in a way that shows you are disappointed at what they have done

trans.tran_cn: 指责， 斥责， 批评
责备，责骂，使丢脸，申斥，损伤…的体面
